desc: We chose the Chinese word "Chi", meaning energy and balance, to emphasize the origin and heritage of these ingredients. This premium multi-blend is perfect for any discerning tea drinker who appreciates fabulous flavour. We place great importance on being sustainable, our products are vegan and organic.

layout.text: Chi Fit - we have wellness down to a tea!
Great Tasting - Premium - Natural - Organic - Vegan - Sustainability - Tea and Coffee Blends
